sentences.sentence: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.translation: 将有机物质掺入白垩质土壤中将会降低碱性。

sentences.sentence: Incorporating the use of social media to screen job candidates is not an uncommon practice.
sentences.translation: 结合使用社交媒体来审查求职者并不是一种罕见的做法。

sentences.sentence: Incorporating potassium dichromate and alcohol into the aniline at various stages of the experimental process, he finally produced a deep purple solution.
sentences.translation: 在实验过程的不同阶段，他将重铬酸钾和酒精加入苯胺中，最终得到了深紫色的溶液。
